item.title: Improved logo, font size and preview video for AppStore App - Upwork
item.description:
Looking to polish up our Logo design, possibly font and motion preview video (the last one will be featured on our AppStore page).

We have a first cut of logo, and video. UX mockups exist in Figma. We want the logo and video to feel more professional than they do today. We also draw a lot of inspiration from TikToks preview video that can be found on app store (our App is similar in design)

The app is called Hmm, which is how we arrived at the logo design

We want it to be done as soon as possible (~within the next one or two weeks).

There is possibilities for follow-up work, especially around UX and app design.

We're not well versed within design, so suggestions and recommendations are welcomed.

We're happy to answer any followup questions and iterate on this together

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 09:13 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Logo Design, UI Animation, Advertisement, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Logo Design, UI Animation, Advertisement, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects
Country: Sweden

item.title: Videographer needed in Orlando, Florida - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

I am looking for a skilled videographer based in Orlando to film an unboxing reaction video. The videographer must have access to a professional camera, lighting equipment, and a high-quality microphone. The ideal candidate will have experience capturing authentic reactions and creating engaging videos.

Responsibilities:

Film an unboxing reaction video in a well-lit and visually appealing setting.
Capture clear audio of the subject's reactions and comments.
Deliver the video in a timely manner.

Requirements:
Owns a professional-grade camera, lighting equipment, and a high-quality microphone.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Please submit the following with your proposal:

A link to your portfolio or examples of your previous work.
A brief overview of your experience filming similar projects.
Your proposed rate for this project.
I look forward to hearing from talented videographers in Orlando who can help me capture this special moment.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$70.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 08:58 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Photography, Camera
Skills: Videography, Photography, Camera
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Full Time Short Form Content Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I own a social media agency called Personal Brand Launch (Instagram @personalbrandlaunch)! I am looking for a short form content editor (Reels, TikTok's, and YouTube Shorts) for a bunch of the companies clients.

Role:
- Short-form content editor
- Remote job
- Full time 8 hours a day (Monday - Friday)
- When hired there will be a short onboarding process and then we will begin

Responsibilities:
- Can be given an editing style to replicate (ie. Hormozi, Ali Abdul, Codie Sanchez, Devin Jatho, etc) and edit a raw video we get from a client with that editing style
- Can edit multiple simple to complex editing styles
- Can edit 5+ shorts per day

Requirements:
1) Experienced Editors - You Have Experience Editing Shorts
2) Someone Dependable - Will Get There Work Done on Time Everyday
3) Someone Wanting a Long-Term Position - Someone Who is Going to Stay for Years
4) Someone Organized
5) Someone Adaptable - Can Learn and Use Personal Brand Launch Systems
6) Someone Looking For Consistency and Security

Pay:
I pay a fixed price of $15 - $25/Per Short depending on the complexity of the edit

Hourly Range: $30.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 08:58 UTC
Category: Copy Editing
Skills:English, Video Editing
Skills: English, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: French + German TikTok Content Creator/ UGC creator wanted - Upwork
item.description:
READ THIS ALL!

We are looking for multiple UGC video content creators for social media in TikTok style. We will send you scripts and provide the products.  We are in the spiritual niche (Feng Shui, Crystals, Meditation, ...) Content delivery in raw format (file produced by phone), no editing or posting. Content is usually requested in batch, longterm creators can expect weekly requests.

No need to edit!


🟩 MUST HAVEs
- native German speaker or accent free speaker
and/OR
- native French speaker or accent free speaker


🟦 THE JOB
- make videos for TikTok/ social media
- you will speak and show your face
- video content: explanatory, educational, unboxing and ads
- say "howdie Sebastian" to show me you read the instructions
- video scripts & briefing provided by us
- the videos will be posted on our social media channels and might be used in ads


🟨 PAYMENT
payment per video
you can keep all products we're sending you as samples

🟪 ABOUT US
We are an ecommerce business selling spiritual products worldwide. We've been in business since 3 years and we're looking to expand our social media reach. We are a team of  7 working fully remote.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 08:56 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Music Video, Content Creation, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Music Video, Content Creation, Social Media Marketing
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: [Longterm] Looking for Video editor for old celebrities and Hollywood stars YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a simple video editor who can do the following:
- Find relevant footage or pictures for the video
- Add effects such as transitions, lower thirds and overlays
- Make an engaging video

To provide a clear idea of the type of content we aim to produce, please take a moment to view the following examples:

https://www.youtube.com/@uncoveredfiles12345
https://www.youtube.com/@TheUltimateExpeditionOfficial
https://www.youtube.com/@TheConcealedFacts-id7ok/
https://www.youtube.com/@PrimeDiscovery-jp1gj

We kindly request that you watch a few videos on the sample channels to grasp the specific style of video editing we're seeking.

The video will be around 20 - 25 minutes long.

Payment: $20 per video
We will be looking for turnaround times of 24h - 48h

To start you will produce 3 - 5 videos a week, which can later be scaled to more videos (if you prefer). This means the monthly pay would be around $400.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 19, 2024 08:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Long-term UGC Content Creators for scaling TikTok Brands - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking UGC content creators to help scale our TikTok brands.

As a content creator, you will be responsible for producing engaging and creative videos that align with the target audience.

Performance-based pay: 15-20% commission / sale + additional bonus pays based on the number of views generated.


You will be:
- Passionate about video editing & hungry to learn
- Familiar with TikTok
- Experience not needed. Proactive attitude is key

The right candidates will work together for a 30 day trial period and will be offered a full-time content creation position thereafter.

item.title: Fashion Product video editor - Davinci - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am a fashion videographer who takes videos of fashion garments. I need someone to do basic cut down videos with very basic cuts. There are between 40-57 videos per shoot. I don't need colour grading for now just cutting the shots into small product videos anywhere from 20-30 seconds. I shoot in 50fps and need it to be slowed down to 25fps.

Thank you,
Milly

Hourly Range: $8.00-$16.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 08:27 UTC

item.title: Web Design and Video Editing Support - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to provide support in creating a website, pages, and funnels for our new business. Additionally, assistance is needed in editing videos and transcripts. This role requires a strong understanding of web design principles, proficiency in video editing software, and excellent attention to detail. The successful candidate will have the ability to work independently, meet deadlines, and deliver high-quality work.

    Responsibilities:
    - Create and design website pages and funnels
    - Edit videos and transcripts to enhance quality and clarity
    - Ensure all content is visually appealing and user-friendly

    Skills:
    - Web design
    - HTML/CSS
    - Video editing
    - Attention to detail
    - Time management

    This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 to 3 months. We are seeking a candidate with intermediate expertise in web design and video editing.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$7.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 08:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, WordPress, Web Design
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, WordPress, Web Design
Country: South Africa

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for YouTube Videos and Shorts - Upwork
item.description:
Only For Native Arabic speakers

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Video Editor to join our team and help us create high-quality YouTube videos and shorts. As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing raw footage, adding transitions and effects, and ensuring seamless video flow. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of current video editing techniques and trends, as well as experience working with YouTube content.

Key Responsibilities:
- Edit and enhance raw footage to create engaging YouTube videos and shorts
- Add transitions, effects, and audio to enhance the video quality
- Ensure seamless video flow and correct any errors or inconsistencies
- Collaborate with the content team to understand the vision and requirements for each video

Skills Required:
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
- Strong understanding of YouTube content and editing trends
- Excellent eye for detail and ability to work with tight deadlines
- Strong communication and collaboration skills

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level editor with prior experience in editing YouTube videos and shorts.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 08:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Instagram Reels in Health & Fitness - Upwork
item.description:
Hello Creative People,

We are looking for Video editors who understand English and Hindi language to be able to edit the videos effectively.

Niche - Health & Fitness
Editing  for - Instagram reels so going to be under or around 60 seconds.

Sometimes the reels will feature gym workout style information or just sitting information, there will be audio in the videos since the videos are educational and informative.

Goal - to grab attention and show it creatively.

The budget mentioned is a dummy budget, kindly provide your commercials for Instagram reel editing.

This could become full time once we see the level of editing and responsiveness.

Regards,
Karan
